Title: Wolf Hall
Actors: Mark Rylance, Damian Lewis, Claire Foy, Bernard Hill, Anton Lesser, Kate Phillips, Joanne Whalley, Charity Wakefield, Jessica Raine, Jonathan Pryce, Mark Gatiss
Plot: England in the 1520s is a heartbeat from disaster. If the King dies without a male heir, the country could be destroyed by civil war. Henry VIII wants to annul his marriage of twenty years and marry Anne Boleyn. The Pope and most of Europe oppose him. Into this impass steps Thomas Cromwell: a wholly original man, a charmer, and a bully, both idealist and opportunist, astute in reading people, and implacable in his ambition. But Henry is volatile: one day tender, one day murderous. Cromwell helps him break the opposition, but what will be the price of his triumph?
